testsuite.name: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts and cancelling with the keyboard

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts and cancelling with the keyboard

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts and cancelling with the keyboard

testcase.name: When I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts and cancelling with the keyboard

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts and cancelling with the keyboard

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts and cancelling with the keyboard

testcase.name: And I type the keyboard shortcut to open the Math Editor and assert that the Math Editor dialog is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts and cancelling with the keyboard

testcase.name: When I type "a/b" in the Equation Editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts and cancelling with the keyboard

testcase.name: And I cancel the dialog with the keyboard shortcut
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts and cancelling with the keyboard

testcase.name: Then I don't see the "a/b" Math Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts and cancelling with the keyboard

testcase.name: Then I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts and cancelling with the keyboard

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts and cancelling with the keyboard
